title: 2 Quick Ways to Remove Your Phone Number on Facebook

steps.title: Open the Facebook app.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app. This looks like an f with a blue background. If you aren't already logged into your account, enter your email address or phone number and password to do so now.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . On iPhone and iPad, this is at the bottom-right corner. On Android, this is at the top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Settings & privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings & privacy . You can find this below the app icons.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . A new page will open.

steps.title: Tap Accounts Center.
steps.content: Tap Accounts Center . This is at the top of the page.

steps.title: Tap Personal details.
steps.content: Tap Personal details . You can find this below the Account settings header.

steps.title: Tap Contact info.
steps.content: Tap Contact info . This is at the top.

steps.title: Tap the number you want to delete.
steps.content: Tap the number you want to delete. If you have more than one, you'll see them listed by date added. [1] X Research source You'll also see all added email addresses.

steps.title: Tap Delete number.
steps.content: Tap Delete number . You may be asked to enter your Facebook password to confirm. Your mobile number will be deleted from your Facebook account.

steps.title: Go to https://www.facebook.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.facebook.com/ in a web browser. You can use any browser. If you aren't already logged in, enter your email address or phone number and password to do so now.

steps.title: Click your profile icon.
steps.content: Click your profile icon. This is in the top-right corner. A drop-down menu will open.

steps.title: Click Settings & privacy.
steps.content: Click Settings & privacy . This is the first option underneath your name.

steps.title: Click Settings.
steps.content: Click Settings . A new page will open.

steps.title: Click Accounts Center.
steps.content: Click Accounts Center . You can find this in the left panel.

steps.title: Click Personal details.
steps.content: Click Personal details . You can find this below the Account settings header.

steps.title: Click Contact info.
steps.content: Click Contact info . This is at the top.

steps.title: Click the number you want to delete.
steps.content: Click the number you want to delete. If you have more than one, you'll see them listed by date added. You'll also see all added email addresses. You can also change your Facebook email if needed.

steps.title: Click Delete number.
steps.content: Click Delete number . You may be asked to enter your Facebook password to confirm. Your mobile number will be deleted from your Facebook account.
